page.title: 04A SCHOOL DAY IN HANWELL
page.content: {7am.}Get up, get dressed, have breakfast (Weetabix, toast and jam, and cup of cocoa) {8am.}Get ready for school, pack bag, brush teeth {9am.}Social studies or singing. {10am.}Assembly at ten past, playtime at half past {11am.}Maths {12am.}Packed lunch, football on field {1pm.}Swimming on Wednesday {2pm.}Playtime at ten past {3pm.}On Friday games, football or rugby, in summer rounders or stoolball {4pm.}Playing with friends {5pm.}Go and have tea {6pm.}On Mondays go to Boy's Brigade {7pm.}Come home and watch T.V. {8pm.}Get ready for bed, then read in bed. {9pm.}At half past try to get some sleep
